Version : 2.7.0
Size : 1.7M
Requires Android : 1.6 and Up 
Last Updated : June 12, 2013
Developers : 8pen Ltd.
[/color]
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img839/9553/34vl.png[/img]
[color=green]The 8pen is a new way of writing on mobile devices. It is natural, fast, and just feels right.
Learn it in a fun and challenging way by playing the game "8pen Wordcup", available for free on the Market.
*Important notice* 8pen will now ask for permission to access the Internet. This is required for the new language pack installation and update mechanism. In no other circumstances will 8pen need access to the Internet.
Note: To all the brave early adopters who purchased the first version of the 8pen in November 2010, send us a mail providing us with your current order number as well as the one from November. We will then offer you a full refund. Thanks again!
Main recent changes:
* Added support for Korean, Brazilian Portuguese, Finnish, Icelandic, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Slovak, Romanian, Croatian, Slovene, Latvian, Lithuanian, Estonian
* Full support for Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich)
* Voice typing for Android >= 4.0: text is now inserted while you speak!
* Improved fluidity and responsiveness
* Improved suggestions and dictionaries
* A new paradigm for word selection
* Arrow gestures
* Tap to edit
* Cut and paste using swipe gestures
* Three numeric keyboards
* New guides and FAQ
* Long-press button actions
* Fully customizable smileys
* Fine-grained feedback
* More center sizes
* Force lowercase

[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img534/8631/dhc8.png[/img]
1. Install APK
2. Launch & Enjoy!!
[/color]
